entry.source: {F812}Hel\0{F87A,-304}{F813,1,419000}The ship I'm making...{F801}Heh heh heh...{F801}{F802}The more people die, the closer I{F801}come to completing it.{F801}{F802}For death hurries the coming of the{F801}Naglfar's construction...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-304}{F813,1,419004}Hahaha. I guess I'll ask you to do{F801}the job, then.{F801}{F802}I am the Reaper Hel.{F801}{F802}{F812}Hel\0{F87A,-304}What I need you to get for me are the{F801}{F804,5}nails of the dead.{F804,0}{F801}{F802}I'm going to use them to build my{F801}ship... the Naglfar.{F801}{F802}We're on the brink of a huge war,{F801}so I need to prepare for it.{F801}{F802}The fresher the nails are, the better{F801}the ship will be.{F801}{F802}Hunt down the walking dead and{F801}collect their nails for me.{F801}{F802}I'm counting on you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hel\0{F87A,-304}{F813,1,419004}Hahaha, you're pretty good at this,{F801}despite what you look like.{F801}{F802}Quite the Hunter now, aren't you?{F801}{F802}Oh, I can never have too many nails{F801}of the dead.{F801}{F802}If you collect more nails, I would be{F801}more than happy to take them off your{F801}hands... so to speak.{F801}
